name: contender
content:

someone who competes with other people to try to win something: contender for Now aged 42, he is no longer considered a serious contender for the title. Synonyms
challenger
competitor
rival

someone who is qualified to compete to win something or to achieve a position of leadership: : He is a top contender for Senate majority leader.
